subject: Personal Finance
title: The SVB Bank Run
description: A quick win: understand The SVB Bank Run.

hook.text: In March 2023, Silicon Valley Bank collapsed in 48 hours. Twitter accelerated the fastest bank run in history.

buildup.text: SVB held deposits from tech startups and invested heavily in long-term government bonds.

discovery.text: When interest rates rose, those bonds lost value. SVB announced a capital raise. Panic followed.

twist.text: Social media spread fear instantly. Depositors withdrew $42 billion in a single day via smartphone.

climax.text: Regulators stepped in within days. But the speed of a social-media-fueled bank run shocked the system.

punchline.text: Bank runs now happen at the speed of a tweet.

quiz.question: What made the SVB bank run unprecedented?
options: Social media accelerated withdrawals to record speed
It was caused by a cyberattack
